title: MIMA Yearbook. Vol. 2
creator_contributor_role: Modern Image Makers Association, production company
abstract: Discs (2 min. 1980)--Spaces. Part 6: Expressive space (5 min. 1981)--Italian boys (3 min. 1982)--Gertrude Street (4 min. 1983)--Indefinite objects (2 min. 1982)--Repeat performance (3 min. 1982)--Turnaround (5 min. 1983)--Personal performances (3 min. 1981)--Dolls (5 min. 1980)--Excerpt (6 min. 1983)--City square (5 min. 1983)--Bob Brown (4 min. 1982)--Natura morta (6 min. 1980)
description: Volume two of a three volume set, this video compilation of excerpts of Australian film and video art covers the period from 1980-1983, and is a unique and tantalising entry into non-mainstream history of Australian film and video.
related_object_notes: B2002998 "Repeat Performance" is an excerpt from Title; 017248; MIMA Yearbook. Vol. 2; Active; 1986. Re-catalogued for Nite Art 2014
